articles.author: Sean Keeler
articles.title: Keeler: CU Buffs on opportunity to end Caitlin Clark’s Iowa Hawkeyes career: “We want to come in and ruin everyone’s day” - The Denver Post
articles.description: CU’s a speed bump. A bit player. The villains standing between America’s favorite shooter and the America’s favorite Final Four narrative. Sadler smiled at that last one. Wickedly…
articles.content: BOULDER — Caitlin Clark wears your heart on her sleeve. Her game is three-fifths Steph Curry, one-fifth Hermione Grainger, one-fifth John Cena. She’s LeBron with a ponytail, Taylor Swift with a bette… [+4728 chars]
